name: PHATE
description: PHATE: Potential of Heat-diffusion for Affinity-based Transition Embedding for dimension reduction.

properties.name: NumDim
properties.description: Number of dimensions in which the data will be embedded.

properties.name: KNN
properties.description: Number of nearest neighbors on which to build kernel.

properties.name: Decay
properties.description: Sets decay rate of kernel tails.

properties.name: t
properties.description: Power to which the diffusion operator is powered sets the level of diffusion.

properties.name: Gamma
properties.description: Informational distance constant between -1 and 1. gamma=1 gives the PHATE log potential, gamma=0 gives a square root potential.
